statements: SELECT * FROM waste_management_invoices;
SELECT invoice_id, amount, payment_status FROM waste_management_invoices WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, invoice_date FROM waste_management_invoices WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_invoices WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT invoice_id, amount FROM waste_management_invoices WHERE payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT * FROM waste_management_invoices ORDER BY invoice_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, invoice_date FROM waste_management_invoices WHERE payment_status='Paid'
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM waste_management_invoices GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT * FROM waste_management_invoices WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND payment_status='Pending' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM waste_management_invoices
SELECT * FROM waste_management_customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM waste_management_customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM waste_management_customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_invoices WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY invoice_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, total_amount FROM waste_management_customers JOIN waste_management_invoices ON waste_management_customers.customer_id = waste_management_invoices.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_customers WHERE customer_id = 1 LIMIT 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM waste_management_customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM waste_management_customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND invoice_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT c.customer_name, i.total_amount FROM waste_management_customers c JOIN waste_management_invoices i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE i.total_amount > 500 ORDER BY i.total_amount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementCustomers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM WasteManagementCustomers;
SELECT service_type, service_cost FROM WasteManagementServices ORDER BY service_cost DESC;
SELECT customer_name, invoice_amount FROM WasteManagementCustomers JOIN WasteManagementInvoices ON WasteManagementCustomers.customer_id = WasteManagementInvoices.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementServices WHERE service_cost < 1000;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementCustomers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM WasteManagementCustomers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM WasteManagementCustomers WHERE customer_id = 1;

SELECT customer_name, service_type, invoice_amount FROM WasteManagementCustomers JOIN WasteManagementInvoices ON WasteManagementCustomers.customer_id = WasteManagementInvoices.customer_id JOIN WasteManagementServices ON WasteManagementInvoices.service_id = WasteManagementServices.service_id;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementInvoices WHERE invoice_amount > 100 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_services;
SELECT customer_id, billing_address, total_amount FROM waste_management_services;
SELECT service_name, service_description, service_rate FROM services_offered;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT invoice_id, payment_date, amount_paid, payment_method FROM billing_history;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_services;
SELECT customer_id, billing_address, total_amount FROM waste_management_services WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT service_name, service_description, service_rate FROM services_offered ORDER BY service_rate DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, billing_address, total_amount FROM waste_management_services WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, description FROM services ORDER BY service_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, service_id, amount FROM invoices WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, position FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, rate FROM services WHERE rate > 100;
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, service_id, date, amount FROM invoices WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, position FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
